modules.description: Generates TikZ-compatible LaTeX code for visualizing meshes using custom macros, supporting edge coloring, point rendering, and filled triangles. Processes mesh data with vertex and edge information, allowing precise control over visual elements like level curves and super/sub-level sets. Outputs commands for plotting P1 finite element method surfaces with specified colors and thresholds.

Provides functions to create, modify, and visualize triangular meshes, including exporting node-based data to scientific and graphical formats. Operates on mesh structures composed of vertices, edges, and triangles, with support for geometric transformations. Enables integration with external tools like SciLab and Matlab by generating compatible output files.

Handles vertex and face data manipulation, including adjacency checks and connectivity analysis. Operates on structured data like lists of 3D points and indexed triangles. Used to validate mesh topology and compute local surface properties.
